Question: WisMedical, Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
WisMedical, Inc.

CES 2024

- Soft and flexible wearables with sensor system technology for accurate measurement even during movement
- Captures and diagnoses cardiopulmonary sounds and vital biometrics with 94.78% accuracy
- Machine learning-based diagnostic platform with an alert system for timely responses
- Lightweight all-in-one wearable biometric monitoring device
- Simultaneously monitors ECG, heartbeat, respiratory frequency, oxygen saturation, body temperature, and auscultation wirelessly in real time
- Suitable for healthcare facilities, home monitoring, patient transfer, telemedicine, and news

Contact:
- CEO: Josh Lee
- TEL: +82-10-2895-0304
- EMAIL: info_kr@wismedical.io
- Locations: Seoul, Republic of Korea and Atlanta, USA
Summary_cn:
WisMedical有限公司。

CES 2024

- 柔软而灵活的可穿戴设备，配备传感器系统技术，即使在运动中也能准确测量
- 以94.78%的准确率捕捉和诊断心肺音和重要生物测量数据
- 基于机器学习的诊断平台，配备及时响应的警报系统
- 轻便一体化的可穿戴生物测量监测设备
- 可同时以无线实时方式监测心电图、心跳、呼吸频率、血氧饱和度、体温和听诊
- 适用于医疗设施、家庭监测、病人转移、远程医疗和新闻报道
